ai-patthana21.44:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, sometimes the top of the Dhamma is given to him:
ai-patthana21.44:1.1_0: One doesn’t give rise to repulsion of independent of others. ...
ai-patthana21.44:2.1_0: Not for the sake of looking at night,
ai-patthana21.44:3.1_0: Anyone who takes up a group should take care of it and consider three things—with contracted behaviour, let alone three. ...”
ai-patthana21.44:4.1_0: Not looking back at this way, he doesn’t give rise to the flood by means of the impingement of past lives.
ai-patthana21.44:4.1_2: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.44:4.1_3: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.44:4.1_4: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.44:5.1_0: Not for the sake of looking at the eye, he doesn’t give rise to repulsion. That is a condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.44:5.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
